verb.description: Give an unofficial name or nickname to (someone or something)
examples: the media dubbed anorexia “the slimming disease.”

verb.description: Dress (an artificial fishing fly) with strands of fur or wool or with other material.
Trim or make smooth (wood) with an adze.

noun.description: An instance of dubbing sound effects or music.
examples: the level of the dub can be controlled manually

noun.description: A style of popular music originating from the remixing of recorded music (especially reggae), typically with the removal of some vocals and instruments and the exaggeration of bass guitar.
